{"id":847783908,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1669085942,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"92 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/847783908/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"22.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        vector<int>perfectSquares;\n        for(int i=1; i<=sqrt(n); i++){\n            perfectSquares.push_back(i*i);\n        }\n\n        queue<int>squareQueue;\n        squareQueue.push(n);\n        int steps  = 0;\n        while(!squareQueue.empty()){\n            int qSize = squareQueue.size();\n            while(qSize--){\n                auto current = squareQueue.front();\n                squareQueue.pop();\n                for(int i=perfectSquares.size()-1; i>=0; i--){\n                    if(perfectSquares[i] <= current ){\n                        int remaining = current - perfectSquares[i];\n                        if(remaining == 0) return steps + 1;\n                        squareQueue.push(remaining);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            steps++;\n        }\n        return steps;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
